summary: Health & Readiness Endpoints Testing Complete - All 4 phases verified. 17/17 tests passed.

tests_passed: GET /api/readiness returns 200 when all dependencies OK

evidence: Code review confirms structured logging format: [READINESS] NOT READY | request_id={id} | failed_checks={n} | reasons={list}
Response does not expose secret values
503 response uses generic reason: 'One or more critical dependencies unavailable'
Only shows failed_checks count, not specific missing secrets

test_credentials_used: None - endpoints do not require authentication
context_for_next_testing_agent: Health & Readiness endpoints fully implemented and tested. Health is a pure liveness probe (no DB). Readiness validates: MongoDB ping, JWT secrets, Stripe, Resend, ENVIRONMENT. Both endpoints work without auth (designed for load balancers). Security verified: no secrets exposed in 503 responses.
